name: One Night at Preddiz's
storyline: You got stuck in an abandoned place which is haunted by three animatronic characters. Those are possesed by the souls of your old friends you lost in a tragic way. Now it's up to you to survive or join them.
summary:
This is a Fnaf Fangame made by DieserAndrew. 
Fnaf is made by Scott Cawthon. 
Can you survive one night in your room hunted down by 3 animatronic characters?
